roleset.name: to give an indication, be suggestive of
roleset.note: SMACK-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. No appropriate VNcls. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from smack.01-v)

example.name: smack-v: transitive
example.text: From the perspective of East Germany 's old guard , reforms that-1 [*T*-1] smack of capitalism and Western-style democracy could eliminate their country 's reason for being .

roleset.name: hit
roleset.note: SMACK-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on ULA. Member of VNcls hit-18.1-1, bump-18.4-1 (from smack.02-v)

example.name: smack-v: I think I might have mentioned that I love ULA
example.text: Among Bessie 's numbers were Dying Gambler 's Blues , Sing Sing Prison Blues , and one I had never heard called Black Mountain Blues , which has the imcomparable lines , Home in Black Mountain a chile' will smack yo' face ;

example.name: smack-v: all args
example.text: So I smacked him with my lunch tray...

example.name: smack-v: ergative
example.text: Mary's open hand smacked John's face.

roleset.name: smack the lips together, making a smacking sound
roleset.note: SMACK-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Member of VNcls crane-40.3.2

example.name: smack-v
example.text: If I have my mother come I have to give kickbacks to my little brother and little sister , they-1 come *PRO*-1 smacking their lips

example.name: smack-n
example.text: She-1 leaned in *PRO*-1 to give him a smack on the cheek, and he leaned away, not-so-subtly avoiding her smooch.
